name: Final Fantasy XIV: Eden's Promise Primal Practice
name_original: Final Fantasy XIV: Eden's Promise Primal Practice
description:
- Note: only active when game is in focus (clicked). Seems to work on some browsers and others not (?)

Emulation of battle mechanic in Final Fantasy XIV, in the Eden's Promise: Eternity (Savage) encounter. It is effectively a memory game.

Whenever the boss Casts something, it will happen immediately. When it Stocks something, it will only be cast when it uses Release. Currently the rate of cast to stock/release is 2 to 1. It can happen that due to randomness, the boss will use many Casts between a Stock and a Release. Keep that memory sharp!

Controls are WASD or Arrow Keys for movement
